crypto.name: Counting
crypto.desc: I heard it is in fashion to have a counter since the last incident happened.

crypto.name: Curvy Decryptor
crypto.desc:
Alice has hidden 2 flags in this challenge. And even though she is willing to decrypt most ciphers, she has some basic saveguards against stealing flags.
Please submit flag1 here.

crypto.name: Curvy Decryptor 2
crypto.desc:
Alice has hidden 2 flags in this challenge. And even though she is willing to decrypt most ciphers, she has some basic saveguards against stealing flags.
Please submit flag2 here.

crypto.name: Euclidean RSA
crypto.desc: Bob apparently likes squares, but what does it have to do with encryption?

crypto.name: PS
crypto.desc: I prepared a message for Alice but if you'd like to add a PS of your own, feel free to do so.

crypto.name: Sebastians Secret Sharing
crypto.desc:
I met Adi on a conference and decided to implement my own Secret Sharing Service.
It's pretty rudimentary, but gets the job done. Let's just hope, I didn't do anything wrong...

misc.name: I See
misc.desc: We have found unsual traffic in our logs. Is there anything interesting in it?

misc.name: U Do Pee
misc.desc:
There was weird traffic on port 10000. Apparently employee 'astroza' tried to bypass our firewall restrictions using a udptunnel tool obtained from GitHub. They said we won't be able to see the traffic, since the tool configures a 'password' to run.
What was the employee trying to download to their computer?

misc.name: funsafe
misc.desc:
FUNSAFE
Safe Rust code is very safe.

pwn.name: Babypwn
pwn.desc: Play a game with @gehaxelt. Can you win?

pwn.name: Hack the Hash
pwn.desc: Somehow this guy "@gehaxelt" still manages to get access to our super secure system, although we blocked his account!

pwn.name: Heavens Flow
pwn.desc: its time to return to heaven. Author: @moaath

pwn.name: Juniorpwn
pwn.desc: Play a game with @gehaxelt. Can you win (again)?

rev.name: Bicyle
rev.desc:
You're only allowed to ride the bicycle if you can find a valid bicycle ID!
There's also a bicycle ID validation service at 52.59.124.14:10060!

rev.name: Movie
rev.desc: Which hacker movies do I like?

web.name: Magic Cars
web.desc: Who doesn't love Magical Cars? go checkout this cool website and even upload your fav gif to support it. Author: @moaath
